title: CrossOver 24 released with Wine 9.0 - plus CodeWeavers still hiring developers
description: CodeWeavers have announced the release of CrossOver 24, their application for managing games and applications designed for Windows installed with Wine on Linux and macOS.

title: Lies of P recently removed Denuvo and it's on sale - good time for soulslike fans
description: For those of you who skip over games that have Denuvo, you might want to go and check in with the rather good soulslike game Lies of P as it's been removed from the game.

title: The Force Engine for classic Star Wars: Dark Forces now on Flathub
description: Want an easy way to get The Force Engine on Linux to play Star Wars: Dark Forces (and eventually Outlaws too)? Well, now it's available on Flathub.

title: Geometry Survivor is wonderful nostalgia bait updated for the survivor-like era
description: I have some ridiculously fond memories of playing Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved, to the point of having a mini-party with lots of us sat around an Xbox 360 blasting through high-scores. To see Geometry Survivor appear is quite a highlight.

title: Move over Diablo 4 and Path of Exile as Last Epoch 1.0 is here
description: Ready for your next action RPG? Diablo and Path of Exile fans may want to take a look at Last Epoch, which has finally left Early Access with the 1.0 update and there's plenty to love about it.

title: Slimbook reveal the AMD powered Excalibur laptop and KDE Plasma 6 Slimbook
description: For all of you who keep asking for more AMD powered laptops, Slimbook have delivered with the brand new Excalibur which also has a KDE Slimbook counterpart.

title: STAR WARS: Battlefront Classic Collection announced with Steam Deck support
description: Aspyr Media are busy! Not long after launching Tomb Raider I-III Remastered, they've now announced the STAR WARS: Battlefront Classic Collection and it's coming with Steam Deck support.
